issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an app & replace the app.js with the app.js for analytics test in feature test repo
2. Follow the instructions for rightscale from this wiki page: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Analytics+Test+Plan
3. Build & run the app on BB device
4. Check rightscale for enroll event

Actual result:
1. We see 2 extra ti.enroll events along with the original ti.enroll & a ti.start

Expected Result:
1. We should see only one ti.enroll event
fields.summary: BlackBerry : We see multiple enroll events (extra 2 in my case) on the first app launch

comments.body:
Verified the fix & now we see a single enroll after the first app launch.
Thus closing
